import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import { UseSelector, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import MetaData from "../layout/MetaData"; import Loader from "../layout/Loader/Loader"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Profile = () => { const {user,loading,isAuthenticated}=useSelector((state) =>state.user) return (

My Profile

Edit Profile

Full Name

{user.name}

Email

{user.email}

Joined On

{String(user.createAt).substr(0, 10)}

My Orders Change password
) } export default Profile;
